body_html:
@yaroslavvb The issue there is that I would need to create a placeholder for all the weights in VGG which is impractical.

@lukaszkaiser This is true for constants, but I think when I tried it with a tensor object it complained -- to be honest though, I am not 100% sure that I tried that and I should have.

body:
@yaroslavvb The issue there is that I would need to create a placeholder for all the weights in VGG which is impractical.

@lukaszkaiser This is true for constants, but I think when I tried it with a tensor object it complained -- to be honest though, I am not 100% sure that I tried that and I should have.
